page.title: 07N.FERRIBY'S LOCAL SHOPS.
page.content: People tend to shop in five areas these are North Ferriby, Hessle, Hull,Beverley and elsewhere. In the main North Ferriby is used for fresh vegetables,medicines and toiletries, meat,bread and biscuits. While shoes, shirts, dresses, furniture and cars are bought elsewhere. This is reflected by the shops which are centered in three areas(a)High Street (the main road into North Ferriby) (b)Low Street (complimentary to the High Street but traditionally for the poorer people). (c)Church Road (opposite to the church) On the High Street there is the Off_licence,estate agent and building society,newsagent,hairdresser and Co_op.
